Fifth & Skin
{'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Brand': 'Fifth & Skin', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2.5 x 5 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HAFS001', 'UPC': '781549120175 641938663488'}
I received this only a few days ago.  I started using this day and night for the past couple of days and find this has a very nice texture and makes your skin very soft and smooth.  I feel it's a great buy as I believe this is a quality product.  This comes in a nice pump bottle and was surprised of the amount it contained.  I do think over time that there will be cumulative effect which will be more visible.  At this point, it's really a nice product.  I have ultra sensitive skin and found I got no allergic reaction from this as well
A Great Product!  You won't be sorry......

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Concern:** Focused on body confidence, particularly addressing cellulite and improving skin appearance, with an expanding interest in facial care to enhance skin softness and anti-aging properties.
- **Product Interest:** Strong preference for body firming tools that also improve skin texture and now includes a particular appreciation for soaps that are effective for sensitive skin. Facial serums are also of interest, marking a holistic approach to skincare.
- **Recent Interaction:** Purchase of a well-regarded soap that has been a longtime favorite, showcasing brand loyalty and trust in longstanding effective products that support personal care routines.
- **Engagement Trends:** Seasonal habits remain evident, with heightened interest in body and hair care solutions during warmer months, emphasizing comfort and functionality in product choices.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages with products thoughtfully, providing detailed feedback based on years of experience. Recent reviews reflect a consistent, balanced approach to evaluating product effectiveness against expectations.
- **General Attitude:** Open to exploring self-esteem-boosting solutions while valuing comfort in both clothing and hair care.
- **Value Proposition:** Seeks practical benefits focused on appearance and ease of use, favoring effective formulations over luxury options.
- **Consumer Behavior:** Prioritizes quality and practical effectiveness in body and hair care, reflecting a commitment to self-improvement through a discerning and thoughtful approach to personal care choices. 

This user profile indicates a dedication to enhancing self-confidence through practical beauty solutions, balancing personal preferences with effective care strategies.
